Summary.Description: Objects that will be created on the target YugabyteDB.

DatabaseObjects.ObjectNames: changeset_geom_gist ON public.osm_changeset, created_idx ON public.osm_changeset, tags_idx ON public.osm_changeset, user_id_idx ON public.osm_changeset, user_name_idx ON public.osm_changeset
DatabaseObjects.Details: There are some GIN indexes present in the schema, but GIN indexes are partially supported in YugabyteDB as mentioned in (https://github.com/yugabyte/yugabyte-db/issues/7850) so take a look and modify them if not supported.

Issues.Reason: This extension is not supported in YugabyteDB by default. Refer to the docs link for the more information on supported extensions.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS postgis WITH SCHEMA public;

Issues.Reason: Unsupported datatype - geometry on column - geom
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE TABLE public.osm_changeset (id bigint NOT NULL, user_id bigint, created_at timestamp, min_lat numeric(10, 7), max_lat numeric(10, 7), min_lon numeric(10, 7), max_lon numeric(10, 7), closed_at timestamp, open boolean, num_changes int, user_name varchar(255), tags public.hstore, geom public.geometry(polygon, 4326)) WITH (colocation=false);

Issues.Reason: Unsupported datatype for Live migration with fall-forward/fallback - public.hstore on column - tags
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE TABLE public.osm_changeset (id bigint NOT NULL, user_id bigint, created_at timestamp, min_lat numeric(10, 7), max_lat numeric(10, 7), min_lon numeric(10, 7), max_lon numeric(10, 7), closed_at timestamp, open boolean, num_changes int, user_name varchar(255), tags public.hstore, geom public.geometry(polygon, 4326)) WITH (colocation=false);

Issues.Reason: Schema contains GIST index which is not supported.
Issues.SqlStatement: CREATE INDEX changeset_geom_gist ON public.osm_changeset USING gist (geom);
